name: Coin Dozer - Kingdom Castle
description:
Coin Dozer — Kingdom Castle is a very nice arcade coin pusher that is one of the famous coin pusher game you'll love!

Just drop shiny gold coins and push them down. Unlock super bonuses to upgrade faster and complete more and more new levels. Click on the coins to wait for the super bonuses unlock.

Enjoy the game with these nice feautures:

  • Great and helpful bonuses
  • Special effects
  • Very realistic physics
  • Fun sounds and graphics
  • Free coin bonus

Join this miracle world of coin dozers and imagine this castle battle!
